annotations.description: Here's how to make the modern Tiki drink, the Ancient Mariner, which is made with Dark Jamaican Rum, Demerara Rum, (or in this case, a Navy Strength combinat...
annotations.title: Ancient Mariner - Cthulhu Meets Tiki: Beachbum Berry’s Remake of Trader Vic's Navy Grog

textContent:
1 oz (30 ml) Dark Jamaican Rum
1 oz (30 ml) Demarara Rum
0.5 oz (15 ml) Simple Syrup
0.5 oz (15 ml) White Grapefruit Juice 
0.75 oz (22 ml) Lime Juice
0.25 oz (7 ml) Pimento Dram (I prefer 1 tsp or 5 ml)
garnish scored lime wedge and mint (or Voyager Swizzle Stick)
(I used 2 oz or 60 ml of a Navy Strength blend of both rums)
(feel free to sub the rums for 1.5 oz or 45 ml of Plantation OFTD Rum)

Add all ingredients to a shaker. Shake with ice. Pour unstrained into Double Old Fashioned Glass or Tiki Mug. Serve with a straw.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pTYk1UQQZOk
title: Ancient Mariner
